description: AccessClinicalData@NIAID is a NIAID cloud-based, secure data platform that enables sharing of and access to reports and data sets from NIAID COVID-19 and other sponsored clinical trials for the basic and clinical research community.
name: https://accessclinicaldata.niaid.nih.gov/

resources.description: AccessClinicalData@NIAID is a NIAID cloud-based, secure data platform that enables sharing of and access to reports and data sets from NIAID COVID-19 and other sponsored clinical trials for the basic and clinical research community

institution.description: The Open Commons Consortium (OCC) manages and operates cloud computing, data commons, and data ecosystems to advance scientific, medical, health care and environmental research for human and societal impact.
institution.name: Open Commons Consortium

resources.name: https://accessclinicaldata.niaid.nih.gov/
